text: مَّا يَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمۡ إِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ وَءَامَنتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمٗا

translation.en: What would Allah do with your punishment if you are grateful and believe? And ever is Allah Appreciative and Knowing
translation.id: (Allah tidak akan menyiksamu, jika kamu bersyukur dan beriman. Dan Allah Maha Mensyukuri,237) Maha Mengetahui
